review: Restrictions about using this product outside USA are not specified in its presentation. Now I am stuck with a useless device while I am outside. I can not even use my HBO GO account or watch videos on youtube. Really disappointed because this restriction wasn't specified.
author: Edgar Garcia

review: As I would like to LoVE it the way I love Apple TV, I feel like there are a couple of things I wish it had. It does not work with APPLE devices (AirPlay) unless you download a third party app that you might have to pay for. Sometimes streaming AirPlay  takes a long time to connect and by the time you connect, you're ready for bed. I assume the fire stick works well with Amazon products such as Apple TV with iPhones and iPads .Other than the AirPlay issue, everything works good. I wish they had the HBO now app and more Apps with better easier search functions when you are looking for apps.
author: latracy

review: Only one thing is denying this product 5 Stars - it lacks NHL Game Center.Other than that, it is a marvelous device that we use quite often.  My only other gripe is that you can not combine music with the photos slideshow.Still, my two peeves are a simple operating system update away, and I have every expectation that Amazon will continue working to make this device the best in class.
